product_title: Lakme Absolute Kohl Ultimate The Gelato Collection

review_text: The product is light to medium buildable coverage. You can have a sheer coverage with just one layer or you can layer 2 more times to build it up wherever you need more coverage. Since it is a very runny formula, please build it up slowly so that you are not left with uneven streaks or lines on the face. It is good for normal to dry skin which provides a beautiful natural glow to the skin. It has SPF 45 that is enough to protect skin from the sun. I prefer using a dense brush to get maximum effect. Since it is a dewy foundation it does transfer if you do not set it with loose powder or compact. This foundation does not oxidize on my skin at all. This foundation will not work well for extremely oily skin. Even if you have combination skin this foundation is not a good choice in very hot summer days when you are out in the sun or sweating a lot. This product will give you a nice glow and leave your skin dewy and healthy looking. But if you sweat a lot or produce too much oil, the foundation will wear off your skin easily and make you look more sweaty. Dry to normal skin beauties can use it any time of the year they want.

review_text: The product is light to medium buildable coverage. You can have a sheer coverage with just one layer or you can layer 2 more times to build it up wherever you need more coverage. Since it is a very runny formula, please build it up slowly so that you are not left with uneven streaks or lines on the face. It is good for normal to dry skin which provides a beautiful natural glow to the skin. It has SPF 45 that is enough to protect skin from the sun. I prefer using a dense brush to get maximum effect. Since it is a dewy foundation it does transfer if you do not set it with loose powder or compact. This foundation does not oxidize on my skin at all. This foundation will not work well for extremely oily skin. Even if you have combination skin this foundation is not a good choice in very hot summer days when you are out in the sun or sweating a lot. This product will give you a nice glow and leave your skin dewy and healthy looking. But if you sweat a lot or produce too much oil, the foundation will wear off your skin easily and make you look more sweaty. Dry to normal skin beauties can use it any time of the year they want.

review_title: Best try if you have never tried highlights before
review_text: I have got knee length long hair and naturally smooth and straight hair but my hair is very thin so I was always scared of hair colouring. So I gave this highlight a try only coloured my front two locks to see how it goes, and trust me its amazing. If you are scared of bleach, then u can go for this product as it is not harsh at all, it doesn't burn the colour of your hair like bleach does it maintains the smooth texture of natural hair. This particular colour isn't vibrant but a ver subtle sunkissed brown which looks really very descent. I can assure you guys for a safe try because it is amazing and far better than other hair colors which u can do at home like streax. For best results, don't use the applicator given with the pack, instead use hair colouring brush take strips of desired hair and paint and wrap in a foil paper keep it for around 1 and a half hours and give some heat with a blow dryer. Remember: if your hair is previously chemical or colour treated this product may not develop the colour on you, especially if you have black coloured your hair.

review_text: OMG! This is an absolutely wonderful liquid lipstick by nyx. I bought this one is the shade 'Vintage'/'Retro'. This is a Mauve kind of shade with a brown muddy undertone which completely justifies the shade's name. The staying power is not that great when compared to Miss Claire's liquid lipstick trust me! But the texture of this one is lighter then the Miss Claire's one. Even the staying power is not that great or something and you may have to reapply it after a meal or after a few hours. One stroke application is enough and also the color can be built up by two or three strokes. The shade is very opaque. Now about me, I have a skin tone one shade darker than Bipasha Basu's current skin tone, a dusky one basically but its not dull. And the shade goes good on me. It looks mauve-ish (lol) but I guess it will ROCK on any Indian skin tone. So it's a safe safe shade. Some might feel its too pricey as the staying power n the quantity we get is not worth 850 bucks I swear. But the shades are wonderful and NYX and Nykaa are trustable ;) can give it a try. I'm also looking forward to try Cherry Skies and Stone Fox(idk abt the latter, not pretty sure. I love this one. So even if i state some cons above I'm gonna rate it 5 stars!

review_title: Not suitable for first time users of an illuminator
review_text: I bought the gleam shade of this illuminator. I guess I was banking on it too much for the ultimate glow I could ever get but that isn't the case for me. The colour is shimmery and very suitable for medium skin tones. But the illuminator needs to be applied real quick as it tends to dry super fast, not giving you a chance to blend it up well for few seconds on your skin. So any one who are trying illuminators or highlighters for the first time should really go for a baked one or powder highlighter which gives you time and chance to play it up before getting the final finish.

author: Vibhuti
product_title: Kay Beauty Ultra Black Volume & Length Mascara - Midnight

review_text: The product is light to medium buildable coverage. You can have a sheer coverage with just one layer or you can layer 2 more times to build it up wherever you need more coverage. Since it is a very runny formula, please build it up slowly so that you are not left with uneven streaks or lines on the face. It is good for normal to dry skin which provides a beautiful natural glow to the skin. It has SPF 45 that is enough to protect skin from the sun. I prefer using a dense brush to get maximum effect. Since it is a dewy foundation it does transfer if you do not set it with loose powder or compact. This foundation does not oxidize on my skin at all. This foundation will not work well for extremely oily skin. Even if you have combination skin this foundation is not a good choice in very hot summer days when you are out in the sun or sweating a lot. This product will give you a nice glow and leave your skin dewy and healthy looking. But if you sweat a lot or produce too much oil, the foundation will wear off your skin easily and make you look more sweaty. Dry to normal skin beauties can use it any time of the year they want.

review_text: My skin is normal to dry and sensitive & I do have some scars of dead acne. I tried this product without prime and concealer to know how it sits on my skin and how much blurring effect it can give. Its light coverage foundation. To build medium coverage you need to take good amount of foundation. It doesn't hide any marks or spots on its own by its first application. But that's what we want for our daily use. It's very light weight formula and doesn't feel like a layer on skin. Very easy to blend and feels like skin. Excellent product for daily use and for all the working ladies. It's definitely hydrating and doesn't feel caky at all. It definitely serves what it claims. Talking about this shade...it's very slightly darker for my skin tone. It's sort of inclined towards orangish-peachy shade while I am more sort of pale. Since it's recently launched you can't use this on findation.com site to find your foundation shade. I would definitely buy a shade lighter than this. I cannot find any daily foundation with so much quantity and at such a reasonable price. Katrina really solved our daily problem by launching this hydrating light weight foundation üòÉüòÉ A big no for oily skin peeps...people with combination can go for it and set their oily regions with translucent powder or compact. Excellent for daily use only. Not for glam look at all. Super hydrating & Not matte. Easy blendable. Teens can try this too.
